backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining core domain models (profiles, training sessions, techniques, belts, analytics) and storing per-user data with access control, blob storage integration, and authorization mixins for a BJJ training log application.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a frontend UX update to the four belt-specific submission dropdown controls, including affected file, dependencies, test IDs, and confidence level.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend React components, hooks, utilities, and pages describing their responsibilities and recent architectural or UX changes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, chart colors, sidebar styling, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that sets up the root container and loads the React application module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, backend actor initialization, theme bootstrapping, and conditional routing between login, profile setup, and the main dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AddTechniqueDial: Dialog component for creating techniques with category selection, searchable/creatable type input, tag management, and automatic YouTube thumbnail generation from links.
frontend/src/components/AddTrainingDialo: Modal dialog for adding or editing a BJJ training session, managing date, duration, type, theme, rolls, and mood, and persisting via query mutations.
frontend/src/components/Analytics.tsx: Empty component file; analytics UI or logic has not yet been implemented.
frontend/src/components/BeltTracker.tsx: Displays and updates the user's BJJ belt and stripe progression with visual states, belt images, and backend synchronization.
frontend/src/components/DebugOverlay.tsx: Toggleable debug panel showing authentication, actor initialization status, progress, warnings, and detailed logs for troubleshooting.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link attribution with an icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with branding, profile access, logout, theme toggle, and debug mode toggle, integrated with authentication and user preferences.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Full-screen login page for Internet Identity authentication with branding, loading states, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/Profile.tsx: Empty component file reserved for a user profile view or editor.
frontend/src/components/ProfileAnalytics: Displays user profile analytics including profile info, belt details, training stats, streak calculation, and a training heatmap using fetched profile and session data.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Provides a form for creating or editing a user profile, handling username, belt progress, gym info, profile picture upload, and practitioner start date with save and cancel flows.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionLogSec: Manages a per-belt submission log, allowing users to add, remove, normalize, and save submission counts while tracking unsaved changes.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionSelect: Implements a searchable, keyboard-navigable popover input for adding submissions from a predefined list while preventing duplicates.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionTagInp: Empty or unimplemented component file reserved for future submission tag input functionality.
frontend/src/components/TechniqueLibrary: Renders a searchable and filterable personal technique library with category tabs and an add-technique dialog backed by fetched technique data.
Renders a yearly GitHub-style heatmap of training hours per day, aggregating session durations by local date and supporting year navigation, date selection, and theme-aware color recalculation.
frontend/src/components/TrainingHoursHea: Displays and edits a weekly-based yearly heatmap of training hours with strict ISO weekday alignment, including controls to add, modify, save, and clear per-day training hours.
frontend/src/components/TrainingLog.tsx: Provides a full training session log with add/edit/delete functionality, expandable session details, and analytics visualizations (charts) summarizing themes, moods, and recent activity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, initializes access control with an optional admin token, and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWrapper.ts: Enhanced actor initialization hook that wraps actor creation with step-by-step state tracking and logging for debugging authentication, identity retrieval, and actor setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, persisted identities, and exposing detailed login status flags via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as user profiles, registration, and training-related records, using an actor wrapper and providing toast-based success/error feedback.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, BJJ-specific colors, utility classes, and custom styling for heat map scrollbars and layout.
frontend/src/lib/beltUtils.ts: Utility functions for working with belt levels, including generating belt image URLs, preloading belt images for caching, and formatting belt display names.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides a formatter to convert backend SessionTheme enum values into user-friendly, readable labels for display.
frontend/src/lib/submissionLogUtils.ts: Helper functions to normalize, add, remove, merge, and update submission counts in a case-insensitive way for submission logging features.
frontend/src/lib/submissionOptions.ts: Exports a constant, typed list of predefined Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu submission techniques used as dropdown options across the app.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: General utilities including class name merging, local-date formatting/parsing, ISO weekday calculation, heat map color logic, and generation of a yearly heat map grid using consistent local-time rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Frontend entry point that creates the React root and wraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard page with tabbed navigation between profile analytics, training log, belt tracker, and technique library components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions to read URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routes, persist them in sessionStorage, and retrieve or clear them with URL values taking precedence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content paths, dark mode strategy, container settings, extended color palette via CSS variables, custom radii, shadows, animations, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Machine-readable snapshot of the projectâ€™s current state, including schema/versioning info, a high-level app summary, and a catalog of implemented features with IDs, descriptions, and versions.
